body:
Hi Vinu, 1. You could create a CSV schedule for 24 hours and then only that run that period in the Run EnergyPlus component using the _analysisPeriod_ input and the _AnalysisPeriod component.  I think that would be the best way to do it.[
](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/VinuSubashini) 2. The file attached is the example file for the Set EP Air Flow component from the Honeybee example files. Have a look at it. 3. The details of this can be found in the EnergyPlus documentation specially the Engineering reference. [http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-3/engineering-reference/win...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-3/engineering-reference/window-calculation-module.html#window-calculation-module) 4. I'd suggest that you check the EnergyPlus documentation, on this but my suggestion is: A. For windows use the Set_EP Air Flow component set the temperature so that the windows will never been closed due to temperature , and then set your own schedule using openingAreaFractionalSched_. B. Use the Shade generator component with a custom blindsSchedule for the blinds. Regards, Anton [Vinu Subashini](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/VinuSubashini)
